content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "get_hyperlinks" command to retrieve a list of hyperlinks from the Google homepage. I executed the "write_to_file" command with arguments "filename" and "text" to write a test message to "my_file.txt" in the Atlas/executed_code directory, and then appended another test message to the same file. I also used the "read_file" command to read the contents of "favorite_books.txt" and tried to replace a line that did not exist,
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "list_files", "args": {"directory": "Atlas/executed_code/"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command list_files returned: ['Atlas/executed_code/neural_network_tests.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/hello_world.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/print_numbers.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/test_average.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/circle_area.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/sum_of_naturals.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/factorial.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_script.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_code.py', 'Atlas/executed_code/my_file.txt']", type='action_result')]
"""
